title: Van der Poel vs. Van Aert (Again), and a Dutch Women’s Armada: 2025 Cyclocross World Championships Mega-Preview
content:
The rankings, the rivalries, the route, and the TV guide: Here's all you need to know about a mud-packed 2025 cyclocross world championships.

Read the full article at Van der Poel vs. Van Aert (Again), and a Dutch Women’s Armada: 2025 Cyclocross World Championships Mega-Preview on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
